name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Jacksonville-South/St. Johns Ctr.

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel to enjoy a visit with my daughter at UNF. (The college is 2 miles away) Our room was nicely furnished, clean and provided everything we needed (and more). Probably the most impressive attribute though, is how wonderfully friendly everyone was. Every employee from housekeeping to maintenance to management, never passed without saying hello and offering a smile. We traveled with a service dog and even how they responded to our scenario, was professional. The hotel is directly next to an amazing shopping area (Ladies, you'll never want to go home!), but the nights were so quiet. Our room backed up to a lake with a beautiful sunrise in the AM, and then we enjoyed our breakfast in a bright and cheery dining area. I highly recommend this hotel and I hope they realize, Customer Service definitely DOES matter!
reviews.title: Incredibly friendly service
Way too much - not a good value

reviews.text: We paid way too much for this hotel. I was on a trip for medical evaluations in Ft. Lauderdale. When we finally arrived, the Internet was not working and the "tech support" had no clue on how to fix it. So, went to the business center...their printer did not work. For the price, you'd think that a printer in the business center would be near the top of the to-do list ... especially since one couldn't get Internet in the rooms. (Several people had difficulty with the Internet).
reviews.title: loved the facilities..but beware of theft, we were ripped off

likes.disliked: — unsecure rooms. We experienced a theft

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In addition to the net problems, there were stains on our sheets. Called the front desk, they reluctantly exchanged the sheets. They tried to explain that the big brown stain were "burns" from the dryer. Personally, I do not care where the big brown stains came from and an analysis was not welcome. When I am paying almost 200/night for the room I think you should be able to get clean sheets if you want them. The room was dusty. There is a lot of construction going on - I don't know if that was a factor. The kitchen area was very small.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

likes.liked: — Shopping and dining within steps of the hotel

reviews.text: The breakfast in the morning was good. Again, the cost of this hotel was way too much in regards to the room and service received. I think a better value could definitely be found, and I do not recommend the hotel for personal use ... way too expensive.
reviews.title: nice new property

reviews.text: My mother and I had been traveling down the coast towards the Orlando area from the Atlanta area during Spring Break of 2009. We could not find any hotels along the coast so we called the Hilton 1-800 number and booked a night at this hotel. Although we arrvied at 2AM, the lady at the front desk was nice, albeit she looked a bit bored. We had no problems checking in.
reviews.title: Very clean, but the walls are paper thin
Bait and Switch?
reviews.text: In order to enter the rooms, you have to use your key to enter a hall and then enter your room from the hall. This method is really loud, as the door is weighted and slams quickly behind you. This is a big problem when the room's walls are paper thin. Although the room was incredibly clean and spacious, our neighbors were up all night and were very loud through the walls.
Our room came equipped with two new small high definition televisions and very big and comfortable bed.
reviews.title: Safe, Clean Hotel

reviews.text: My only complaints are the paper thin wallls and the fact that it would be very easy to break into a room on the ground floor.
reviews.title: Nice hotel; walls like paper

reviews.text: Called for a weekend Sr. Rate. When I called back to make a reservation, they said no rooms available for that night. Called back for the next night, and they said rooms available, but not at the Sr. Rate I was quoted. Left message for Manager to call me. A day later no return call. Finally Faxed the General Manager, but she's out with the flu, so the Regional Sales Manager responded to my fax and said he'd let me know. Two days later, he said they'd honor the Sr. Rate they quoted. By then we'd made other plans.
reviews.title: Best Business Hotel Nearby

likes.liked: — Location - above average for business hotel, and reasonably priced
likes.disliked: — ... ummm, the beer, which was free mind you, was Budweiser... but hey, its free beer ;-)

reviews.title: Nice place!
reviews.text: Visited over Memorial Day weekend. Property is just less than a year old and everything is very fresh. The suite with two queen beds was quite large. Love having the living room seperate from the bedroom. Plenty of places to eat just a few steps away at the St. John's Town Center. I'd not hesitate to stay here again.

Cannot say enough good things about this hote. Staff is very friendly and committed to the homewood hilton 100% guarantee. They really try to learn your name. Rooms were very new, bed ohhh so comfy. Breakfast and dinner salad and appetizers provided. Great location to the St. Johns Town Center. Mainly business travelers. But would be great for a family.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: As with most the other reviews: excellent location. How does a hotel right on a trendy outdoor mall sound? Just about every mainstream dining chain is here. Pf Changs, Cheesecake factory, J Alexanders, more.
reviews.title: Your extended stay business travelor review

reviews.text: Like the mall itself, this Homewood is new. With modern touches like flat screens, well appointed kitchens and rooms. This property is definitely worth putting on your list regardless of the duration of your stay. Highlights follow:
reviews.title: A Great Place for a Bat Mizvah
More attention to detail is needed

reviews.text: 1. Outstanding location! Shopping and dining, this can't be beat.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at quiet and cleanliness

description: Welcome to the Homewood Suites by Hilton® Jacksonville-South/St. Johns Center hotel, an upscale hotel situated in the newest and most talked about shopping and entertainment destination in Jacksonville. Our all-suite hotel is only a 15-minute drive away from the city's fastest growing business district and an excellent choice for extended stay business or leisure travelers. Additionally, the hotel features a Suite Start™ hot breakfast buffet every morning, and an evening Welcome Home® reception (Monday through Thursday), where you can experience genuine Homewood Suites by Hilton® Jacksonville-South/St. Johns Center hospitality! Stay with us to experience exceptional service and our trademark Hilton hospitality. Make Yourself at Home.®
